verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, Concerning the <S%H4150>feasts<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> to be <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocations,<s%> even <S%H428>these<s%> are my <S%H4150>feasts.<s%>

<S%H8337>Six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall <S%H4399>work<s%> be <S%H6213>done:<s%> but the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> is the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of <S%H7677>rest,<s%> an <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation;<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> therein: it is the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4186>dwellings.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H4150>feasts<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> even <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocations,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> in their <S%H4150>seasons.<s%>
In the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> day of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H996>at<s%> <S%H6153>even<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H6453>passover.<s%>

And on the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2088>same<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> is the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> bread to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you must <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> bread.

In the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall <S%H1961>have<s%> an <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation:<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>no<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> therein.

But you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> an offering made by fire to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%> in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> is an <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation:<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>no<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> therein.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3588>When<s%> you be <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5414>give<s%> to you, and shall <S%H7114>reap<s%> the <S%H7105>harvest<s%> thereof, then you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H6016>sheaf<s%> of the first <S%H7225>fruits<s%> of your <S%H7105>harvest<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest:<s%>

And he shall <S%H5130>wave<s%> the <S%H6016>sheaf<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to be <S%H7522>accepted<s%> for you: on the <S%H4283>morrow<s%> after the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5130>wave<s%> it.

And you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> when you <S%H5130>wave<s%> the <S%H6016>sheaf<s%> an he <S%H3532>lamb<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> thereof shall be <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6241>tenth<s%> deals of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> an offering made by fire to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell:<s%> and the <S%H5262>drink<s%> offering thereof shall be of <S%H3196>wine,<s%> the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part of an <S%H1969>hin.<s%>

And you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> nor <S%H7039>parched<s%> corn, nor green <S%H3759>ears,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H2088>selfsame<s%> <S%H6106><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> that you have <S%H935>brought<s%> an <S%H7133>offering<s%> to your <S%H430>God:<s%> it shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4186>dwellings.<s%>

And you shall <S%H5608>count<s%> to you from the <S%H4283>morrow<s%> after the <S%H7676>sabbath,<s%> from the <S%H3117>day<s%> that you <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H6016>sheaf<s%> of the <S%H8573>wave<s%> offering; <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> shall be <S%H8549>complete:<s%>

Even to the <S%H4283>morrow<s%> after the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> shall you <S%H5608>number<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> and you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

You shall <S%H935>bring<s%> out of your <S%H4186>habitations<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H3899>loaves<s%> of <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6241>tenth<s%> deals; they shall be of fine <S%H5560>flour;<s%> they shall be <S%H644>baked<s%> with <S%H2557>leaven;<s%> they are the first <S%H1061>fruits<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> with the <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H6499>bullock,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams:<s%> they shall be for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> with their meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and their <S%H5262>drink<s%> offerings, even an offering made by fire, of <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Then you shall <S%H6213>sacrifice<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>kid<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering, and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> for a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8002>peace<s%> offerings.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5130>wave<s%> them with the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of the first <S%H1061>fruits<s%> for a <S%H8573>wave<s%> offering <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> with the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3532>lambs:<s%> they shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for the <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

And you shall <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> on the <S%H2088>selfsame<s%> <S%H6106><s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that it may be an <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%> to you: you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>no<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> therein: it shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4186>dwellings<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

And when you <S%H7114>reap<s%> the <S%H7105>harvest<s%> of your <S%H776>land,<s%> you shall not make <S%H2891>clean<s%> <S%H3615>riddance<s%> of the <S%H6285>corners<s%> of your <S%H7704>field<s%> when you <S%H7114>reap,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall you <S%H3950>gather<s%> any <S%H3951>gleaning<s%> of your <S%H7105>harvest:<s%> you shall <S%H5800>leave<s%> them to the <S%H6041>poor,<s%> and to the <S%H1616>stranger:<s%> I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> In the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> in the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> shall you <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H7677>sabbath,<s%> a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> of <S%H8643>blowing<s%> of trumpets, an <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation.<s%>
You shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>no<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> therein: but you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> an offering made by fire to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H389>Also<s%> on the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> there shall be a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3725>atonement:<s%> it shall be an <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%> to you; and you shall <S%H6031>afflict<s%> your <S%H5315>souls,<s%> and <S%H7126>offer<s%> an offering made by fire to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> in that <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> for it is a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3725>atonement,<s%> to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for you <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

For <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> it be that shall not be <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> in that <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> he shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from among his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> it be that <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> in that <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> the <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> will I <S%H6>destroy<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> manner of <S%H4399>work:<s%> it shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4186>dwellings.<s%>

It shall be to you a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of <S%H7677>rest,<s%> and you shall <S%H6031>afflict<s%> your <S%H5315>souls:<s%> in the <S%H8672>ninth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month<s%> at <S%H6153>even,<s%> from <S%H6153>even<s%> to <S%H6153>even,<s%> shall you <S%H7673>celebrate<s%> your <S%H7676>sabbath.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> shall be the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tabernacles<s%> for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

On the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be an <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation:<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>no<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> therein.

<S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> an offering made by fire to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be an <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%> to you; and you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> an offering made by fire to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> it is a <S%H6116>solemn<s%> <S%H6116>assembly;<s%> and you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>no<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> therein.

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H4150>feasts<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> to be <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocations,<s%> to <S%H7126>offer<s%> an offering made by fire to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and a meat offering, a <S%H2077>sacrifice,<s%> and <S%H5262>drink<s%> offerings, every <S%H1697>thing<s%> on his <S%H3117>day:<s%>

<S%H905>Beside<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H905>beside<s%> your <S%H4979>gifts,<s%> and <S%H905>beside<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5088>vows,<s%> and <S%H905>beside<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5071>freewill<s%> offerings, <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H389>Also<s%> in the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> when you have <S%H622>gathered<s%> in the <S%H8393>fruit<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> you shall <S%H2287>keep<s%> a <S%H2282>feast<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%> on the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be a <S%H7677>sabbath,<s%> and on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be a <S%H7677>sabbath.<s%>

And you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> you on the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H6529>boughs<s%> of <S%H1926>goodly<s%> <S%H6086>trees,<s%> <S%H3709>branches<s%> of <S%H8558>palm<s%> trees, and the <S%H6057>boughs<s%> of <S%H5687>thick<s%> <S%H6086>trees,<s%> and <S%H6155>willows<s%> of the <S%H5158>brook;<s%> and you shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

And you shall <S%H2287>keep<s%> it a <S%H2282>feast<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> in the <S%H8141>year.<s%> It shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> in your <S%H1755>generations:<s%> you shall <S%H2287>celebrate<s%> it in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>

You shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H5521>booths<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that are <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> <S%H249>born<s%> shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H5521>booths:<s%>

That your <S%H1755>generations<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> that I made the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H5521>booths,<s%> when I <S%H3318>brought<s%> them out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>declared<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> the <S%H4150>feasts<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
